-1.title: Kevin Smith Kirkwood: Some of My Favorite Christmas Memories

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Dan Bazile: People Will Be People

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Revolution - In March 2004, Dan Bazile joined the news team at WNYT (a television affiliate of NBC), where he anchors "Weekend Today". Prior to that, he spent several years as an actor and freelance writer before jumping into television news in 1999.

2.title: Dr. Hassan Tetteh: It Took Perseverance to Keep Going

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Perseverance - Dr. Hassan Tetteh is a board-certified surgeon specializing in thoracic surgery, critical care, heart and lung transplantation, research and education.

3.title: Melba Moore: Things Don't Always Happen When You Want Them To

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Perseverance - American R&B singer and actress Melba Moore is a 4-time Grammy nominee and the winner of the 1970 Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actress in a Musical.

4.title: Tito Puente Jr.: You Have to Find Happiness in Being Grateful

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Happiness - Tito Puente, Jr. is a bandleader. He is the son of legendary mambo musician Tito Puente and the brother of local New York City meteorologist Audrey Puente. Puente, Jr. carries on his father's legacy.

5.title: Yolanda Franklin-Moore: The Environment Is Full of Happiness

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Happiness - Yolanda Franklin-Moore is Fashion Designer and Owner of Xande Fadee, an innovative fashion and accessories line. Yolanda is a highly skilled fashion designer with a creative flare. She has over 20 years of experience in the fashion industry.

6.title: HRH Prince Emanuele Filiberto: True Moments of Happiness

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Happiness - HRH Emanuele Filiberto of Savoy, Prince of Venice is an Italian television personality, a member of the House of Savoy and the son and heir of Vittorio Emanuele, Prince of Naples. He is the only male-line grandson of Umberto II, the last King of Italy.

7.title: Peppermint: Owning Your Confidence

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Identity - The hardest working woman in show business, drag queen and recording artist Peppermint has conquered the New York scene with her high-energy and engaging personality. She is currently a contestant on "RuPaul's Drag Race" (Season 9).

8.title: M.C. El Bee: Not Changing That for Anyone

episode of.title: Shefik Presents Invocation: The Journey Continues (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Identity - Author Larry Boatright, also known as M.C. El Bee in the hip-hop community, talks about the birth and propagation of hip-hop in the 1970s and 1980s in his biography "A Gangsta'z Tale Hip-Hop In Da '70s: Invisible Legends of Hip-Hop".

imdb.plot outline: "Shefik presents Invocation" is a multiple award-winning show. It is a mesmerizing and thought-provoking journey through musical discovery and appreciation that spans the decades. Each episode, executive-produced and hosted by media personality Shefik, highlights one relatable focal point, along with an accompanying playlist of songs, encompassing a unique thematic concept that invigorates the audience with creative impact. Top recording artists, actors, business executives, politicians, community leaders, and other special guests are invited to offer their own commentary on the topic, as a supplement to Shefik's engaging mindset. The journey continues right here and everywhere.

Each episode, executive-produced and hosted by media personality Shefik, highlights one relatable focal point, along with an accompanying playlist of songs, encompassing a unique thematic concept that invigorates the audience with creative impact. Top recording artists, actors, business executives, politicians, community leaders, and other special guests are invited to offer their own commentary on the topic, as a supplement to Shefik's engaging mindset. The journey continues right here and everywhere.
